name: Word Golf
description:
A fun and casual word puzzle game, in which you have to use up all of your letters in as few words as possible. Originally designed for android, uploading it here to keep all of my games in one location.

->Multiple difficulties!
->Timed and casual game modes!

Letter tile assets from Kenney.nl

If you enjoyed this you can download it as an android app, completely free, no micro-transactions, no ads:
